review.title: “A new high tech company creating technology of nano-catalyst”
review.pros: Pros – A new company with a lot of energy. Most of the employees have a degree above Master. It is a place to learn something really cutting edge in the industry
review.cons: Cons – Sometimes may need to work overtime, or shift working schedule with co-workers to meet the deadlines.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
